subject: Fwd: NEWSLETTER - LAST CORRECTIONS AND MAILING

full_threads.body: Heath Maguire Thanks Heath!
Fwd: NEWSLETTER - LAST CORRECTIONS AND MAILING
Joao Henriques Just closing this ticket, he deleted some subscribers to bring it under the 2000 mark, so I was able to send. All done. Cheers
Heath Maguire Ok, no worries, let's wait until he upgrades the account. Cheers

Joao Henriques please note, I have created the campaign, but we can't send it out until James upgrades their plan to a paid one as they now have over 2,000 subscriber. I have sent him an email just now explaining this. Cheers.

Thanks Heath. Here’s the list


Do send out at 10am


JAMES
Fwd: NEWSLETTER - LAST CORRECTIONS AND MAILING

Hi James,


I just tried to call you and got your voice mail.


I believe Joao has actioned all of the tasks for you today, but feel free to give me a call on +61 415 162 271 if you need anything else?


Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

Hi James,


Apologies, I thought I had let you know previously that all the changes you've requested were done.


I've updated the newsletter and the website pages as previously requested and now I've done this last tweaks you've requested on last email.


Please let me know if you need anything else changed before we send it tomorrow morning.


Thanks

Sure, it's now updated.


Thanks

Hi Joao


Can we take out the sailing photo on this page and the caption …


https://hssaustralia.com.au/anterior-hip-replacement/


JAMES

Hi .. can we take out the sailing shot on this page ….


https://hssaustralia.com.au/anterior-hip-replacement/


From: James Croll
Sent: Monday, 7 May 2018 4:15 PM
To: 'Joao from WP Perk and 1 other' <notifications+user_5ab2fd8c62b4228b9abe9f33_a7a61c1683f910a5bc42e5bb26ab7c49aece4ca5@inbound.intercom-mail.com>
Cc: 'Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ' <heath@wolfiq.com.au>; 'jcroll@ausleisure.com.au' <jcroll@ausleisure.com.au>
Subject: James - enews
Importance: High


Hi Heath / Joao


I just went into Mailchimp and the Newsletter isn’t right.


The first story on Isobel seems to have been duplicated.


Can you give me a call on 0488 090 904?


If we can get it corrected ..I’ll then forward you the database for it to send out to.


I’d like to get this out Tuesday morning if possible


JAMES

Hi James,


The duplicated story was now deleted. Please let us know if there's anything else that needs to be amended.


Thanks
Fwd: NEWSLETTER - LAST CORRECTIONS AND MAILING
Fwd: NEWSLETTER - LAST CORRECTIONS AND MAILING

Hi Heath / Joao


I just went into Mailchimp and the Newsletter isn’t right.


The first story on Isobel seems to have been duplicated.


Can you give me a call on 0488 090 904?


If we can get it corrected ..I’ll then forward you the database for it to send out to.


I’d like to get this out Tuesday morning if possible


JAMES

Heath Maguire I've done the requested changes on newsletter and website article pages. there's only one thing I don't understand in the newsletter...the first two blocks are duplicated, but he didn't say to amend...lol, does he want it like that? Can you please have a look and schedule the launch for tomorrow morning? I just don't want to mess up cause I'm not used to do it. Cheers!
Fwd: NEWSLETTER - LAST CORRECTIONS AND MAILING

Begin forwarded message:


From: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>

Subject: NEWSLETTER - LAST CORRECTIONS AND MAILING

Date: 7 May 2018 at 11:36:46 am AEST

To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>


Hi Heath,

Can you make the final amends to the ENewsletter and the respective web pages?

An email is to follow detailing the database and mailing instructions.

Can we schedule the Newsletter to go out tomorrow morning?

JAMES

NEWSLETTER – In Mailchimp

· Change sailing photo to the diagram of the hip

HIP FEATURE - https://hssaustralia.com.au/anterior-hip-replacement/

· Include caption below diagram: Anterior surgical approach to the right hip

· Change: Dr Grahame Ctercteko to correct spelling in Newsletter and on feature page

ISOBEL EYE FEATURE – https://hssaustralia.com.au/centenarian-isobel-has-her-eyesight-restored/

Copy corrections as follows:-

ISOBEL’S DISCHARGE HOME FROM HSS AND HER PROGRESS TO DATE

Following her stay at HSS, Isobel returned home to the support of her family and her quality of her life has improved no end. She is able to read, watch television and enjoy the attention of her grandchildren.

Two months on from the procedure, she is also making regular visits to Dr Samarawickrama’s clinic in Norwest.

“We need to monitor improvement in vision and ensure that the graft does not undergo rejection,” says Dr Samarawickrama. “Progress has been excellent and in three months time I expect her to be maintaining as much independence as possible. It’s not just a case of monitoring progress; it’s also ensuring that everything is communicated to the family and they have a realistic understanding of what her vision will be. Approaching it this way enables us to ensure that Isobel’s quality of life improves no end and that the family can enjoy this quality time together.”


From: Frederick Hoe [mailto:hoe_lem@hotmail.com]
Sent: Thursday, 3 May 2018 10:37 PM
To: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>; gramatter@connexus.net.au
Subject: Re: ANTERIOR HIP REPLACEMENT FEATURE ... Please check and reply

Hi James,

I have read the article. From my point of view I am not really comfortable with the image of the sailing boat as it is not really Grahame himself in the picture. I think the article would still be OK without the image.

Other little things..

The image of the hip should have a label such "anterior surgical approach to the right hip".

Also Grahame's name is mis-spelt.

I have no other changes.

Kind regards,

Dr Hoe

From: James Croll <JamesCroll@hssaustralia.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 3 May 2018 5:37 PM
To: Frederick Hoe; gramatter@connexus.net.au
Subject: ANTERIOR HIP REPLACEMENT FEATURE ... Please check and reply

Dear Dr Hoe & Dr C

I trust you’re well. I am sorry for the delay in getting the newsletter together.

HOWEVER .. please can you possibly click on the following link when you have a chance and just check the feature through?

If you could let me know of any last minute changes by Monday afternoon I would be grateful.

I’ve taken the liberty of using a library shot for the sailing … I think it works well.

The newsletter will then go out to our database of GP’s .. specialists .. suppliers .. and other subscribers on Wednesday afternoon next week.

https://hssaustralia.com.au/anterior-hip-replacement/

MANY THANKS FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION & ASSISTANCE!

James Croll

Marketing Manager


HOSPITAL FOR SPECIALIST SURGERY
17-19 Solent Circuit, Bella Vista 2153

P: 02 8624 5000 ● Fax: 02 8711 0577

www.hssaustralia.com.au

Direct: 02 8711 0505 ● Ext: 505

Email: jamescroll@hssaustralia.com.au
